bug.author: rishantagarwal
bug.summary: Error in ORB.detect function , unbound type error
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>


OpenCV => 3.4
Operating System / Platform => Mac OS X ( Related to JS version of Open CV)
JS has been built using branch 3.4

<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>

Was trying to use orb.detect() function in JS but it throws errors:
Cannot call Feature2D.detect due to unbound types: NSt3__26vectorIN2cv8KeyPointENS_9allocatorIS2_EEEEâ†µ at UnboundTypeError
<denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>

Use the steps as mentioned in the tutorial to include JS file in your code
and then when opencv has been loaded into Browser memory run this code
console.log(cv);
let imgMat = cv.imread(imgElement);
let orb = new cv.ORB();
let kp = orb.detect(imgMat,"");
console.log("kp",kp);
// let result = orb.compute(imgMat,kp);
// console.log("result",result);
mat.delete();

comments.comment:
Related to this issue here : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/issues/11300>#11300</denchmark-link>
PR : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/12659>#12659</denchmark-link>
cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dkurt>@dkurt</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rishantagarwal>@rishantagarwal</denchmark-link>
, Thank you for your report! Please test the changes from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/12767>#12767</denchmark-link>
 replacing
let kp = orb.detect(imgMat,"");
to the following code:
let kp = new cv.KeyPointVector();
orb.detect(imgMat, kp);
Thanks for the changes, will check and get back asap. Appreciate your efforts

It would be nice to have:
DMatch wrapper corresponding JavaScript tests
I second <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alalek>@alalek</denchmark-link> , can we have DMatch wrapper ?
